comments: Omitting the leading 0, these are the partial sums of the centered icosahedral (or cuboctahedral) numbers (A005902). - _Jonathan Vos Post_, Mar 14 2006
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5, -10, 10, -5, 1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _J. H. Conway_
extensions: Definition corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 10 2008
